column3: **Test Case**
Verify that cursor is focused on “Username” text box on the page load (login page).
Verify that the login screen contains elements such as Username, Password, Sign in button, Remember password checkbox, Forgot password link, and Create Account / Register / Sign Up link.
Verify that tab functionality is working properly or not.
Verify that Enter key works as a substitute for the Sign in button.
Verify that all the fields such as Username and Password have a valid placeholder.
Verify that the labels float upward when the text field is in focus or filled (in case of floating label).
Verify that the User is able to log in with valid credentials.
Verify that the User is not able to log in with invalid Username and invalid Password.
Verify that the User is not able to log in with valid Username and invalid Password.
Verify that the User is not able to log in with invalid Username and valid Password.
Verify that the User is not able to log in with blank Username or Password.
Verify that the User is not able to log in with space as Username or Password.
Verify that the User is not able to log in with inactive credentials.
Verify that clicking on the browser back button after successful login should not take the User to the logged-out mode.
Verify that clicking on the browser back button after successful logout should not take the User to the logged-in mode.
Verify that there is a limit on the total number of unsuccessful login attempts.
column5: User will be asked to enter CAPTCHA or the account will be blocked after X attempts based on business logic.

column3: Verify that the password is in encrypted form when entered.
Verify that the password can be copy-pasted.
Verify that encrypted characters in the “Password” field should not allow deciphering if copied.
Verify that the User should be able to log in with the new password after changing the password.
Verify that the User should not be able to log in with the old password after changing the password.
Verify that if the User has initiated the process of password change but not completed it, they should still be able to log in with old credentials.
Verify that spaces should not be allowed before any password characters attempted.
Verify that the User is still logged in after a series of actions such as sign in, close the browser, and reopen the application.
Verify that the “Remember password” checkbox is unselected by default.
column5: Depends on business logic: may be selected or unselected by default.

column3: Verify that the “Keep me logged in” checkbox is unselected by default.
column5: Depends on business logic: may be selected or unselected by default.

column3: Verify that the logout link redirects to the login/home page.
Verify that the User is redirected to the appropriate page after successful login.
Verify that the User is redirected to the Forgot Password page when clicking on the Forgot Password link.
Verify that the User is redirected to the Create an Account page when clicking on the Register / Sign Up / Create an Account link.
Verify that a validation message is displayed if the User leaves the Username or Password fields blank or inputs only spaces.
Verify that a validation message is displayed if the character limit of the Username or Password fields is exceeded.
Verify that a validation message is displayed if special characters are entered in the Username or Password fields.
Verify if the font, text color, color coding, and sequence of the Login page adhere to the design standards.
Verify that the "Show Password" icon is present in the Password textbox and reveals the password in text format when clicked.
Verify the login page and all its controls in different browsers.
Verify whether the login form reveals any security information when viewing the page source.
Verify that the login page is not vulnerable to SQL injection.
Verify whether Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability can be exploited on the login page.
Verify that there is client-side validation when the User doesn’t enter CAPTCHA.
Verify that the refresh link of CAPTCHA generates a new CAPTCHA.
Verify that the CAPTCHA is case sensitive.
Verify whether the CAPTCHA has audio support.
Verify the Page Title after successful login.
Verify that the User is locked after multiple invalid login attempts when lockout is set.
